posts.message: We Need A Good looking & Good working Islamic App, which support Multi-platform & Open sourced :)

We have a good Initiative to make an Islamic Application that will allow us to find islamic Centers World Wide. The project is made as "Sadaka Gariah" for whoever wanna join. If you are interested send me your gmail so i can share with you the project document :) looking forward for a lot of Folks to join :)
anyone know a good news jQuery News Ticker Plugin?

I need your support to vote for my charity NGO project 7alawa7da that will help the needy, you may open its youtube page then click "like" under the video page using your Gmail account 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zgyhrqoa_-E&feature

I really need your support to increase number of votes as the project is participated in Gist competition that depends on number of youtube video "likes" so each like count ::)
